tables.table_schema:
CREATE TABLE sensor_logs (
    log_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    sensor_id INT,
    log_message TEXT,
    log_timestamp TIMESTAMP,
    FOREIGN KEY (sensor_id) REFERENCES sensor_data(sensor_id)
);

CREATE TABLE SensorData (
    id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    sensor_id INT,
    data_type VARCHAR(50),
    timestamp TIMESTAMP,
    data_value FLOAT
);

CREATE TABLE Motion (
  motion_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  sensor_id INT,
  is_motion_detected BOOLEAN,
  motion_timestamp TIMESTAMP,
  FOREIGN KEY (sensor_id) REFERENCES Sensors(sensor_id)
);
